name: Contract Killer - Sniper Assas
description:
Contract Killer - Sniper Assassin is about counter terrorist missions, counter strike on enemies to destroy enemies & kill all terrorist through counter attack with rapid shooting machine guns, hand grenades & other weapons.
Features:
Realistic 3D graphics.
Different Sniper Guns.
Powerful Assault Rifle Guns.
Different game modes.
Realistic Missions.
Real in-game sounds.
Challenging locations.
